titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to reauthorize the market access program, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to reauthorize the market access program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to extend additional Commodity Credit Corporation authority for the use of funding and/or commodities for the: (1) market access program; and (2) foreign market development cooperator program.
